mapper.sql: FUID , FULLNAME , CODE , SEQUENCE , DESCRIPTION , CREATEDATE , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERREALNAME
mapper.insert: insert into base_datadictionary ( FUID , FULLNAME , CODE , SEQUENCE , DESCRIPTION , CREATEDATE , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERREALNAME ) values ( #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into base_datadictionary
FUID ,
FULLNAME ,
CODE ,
SEQUENCE ,
DESCRIPTION ,
CREATEDATE ,
MODIFYDATE ,
MODIFYUSERREALNAME

mapper.update:
update base_datadictionary
FULLNAME=#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SEQUENCE=#{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_datadictionary set FULLNAME=#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SEQUENCE=#{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER} , DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM base_datadictionary WHERE FUID IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from base_datadictionary where #{0} LIKE CONCAT('%','#{1}','%' )
